title: Live updates as Spurs and Knicks face off in NBA Cup final in Las Vegas
content: Follow along for live updates and highlights as the New York Knicks face the San Antonio Spurs in Las Vegas in the NBA Cup final.

title: Silver: NBA expansion decision will be made in '26
content: Adam Silver laid out a definitive timeline for expansion for the first time, saying a decision will be made sometime in 2026 on whether to add more NBA teams.

title: Boxer Crawford retires: 'Nothing else left to prove'
content: Five-division champion Terence Crawford announced his retirement from boxing Tuesday, saying he was "walking away as a great with nothing else left to prove."

title: Kerr: Lacob email no big deal; Dubs all frustrated
content: Steve Kerr acknowledged a leaked email exchange between Warriors owner Joe Lacob and a fan that illustrated frustrations with the team, but he maintained that he and Lacob still have a "great connection."

title: Dolphins' McDaniel opens door to benching Tua
content: Dolphins coach Mike McDaniel opened the door to a possible quarterback change Tuesday, saying "everything is on the table," after Tua Tagovailoa's performance in Monday night's loss to the Steelers.

title: ACC unveils 'transition' 2026 conference schedule
content: Twelve of the ACC's 17 schools will play nine conference football games in 2026, while five schools, with already scheduled Power Four opponents, will play eight games.

title: NBA: 3 incorrect calls favored Nuggets in OT win
content: There were three incorrect calls in the last two minutes of Denver's OT victory over Houston that all favored the Nuggets, according to the NBA's report.

title: Love heads to NFL draft after stellar Irish run
content: Jeremiyah Love, the star Notre Dame running back and Heisman Trophy finalist, made it official Tuesday night and declared for the 2026 NFL draft.

title: Collier: No change post-WNBA callout yet confident
content: Three months after her exit interview in which she called for new WNBA leadership, Lynx star Napheesa Collier said that while "nothing has changed" at the league level, she remains confident in the future as the players' union works toward a new CBA.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Lens' Sangare on radar for several PL clubs
content: Teams such as Manchester United and Chelsea are interested in Lens midfielder Mamadou Sangare. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: Bondi Beach attack: Shooter didn't visit India even after father's death - decoding Hyderabad link
content: Terror suspect Sajid Akram, shot dead by Australian police after the Sydney attack, had limited contact with his Hyderabad family since emigrating in 1998.  Authorities believe both Akram and his son, Naveed, were radicalized in Sydney, with no apparent connection to India.  Naveed's vehicle reportedly contained explosives and ISIS flags.

title: Delhi smog crisis continues: Air quality stays 'very poor' at 350; 11 areas show 'severe' AQI
content: Delhi's air quality remains hazardous due to dense smog. Authorities have tightened pollution curbs, including restricting petrol sales for vehicles without PUC certificates and banning older vehicles. Air traffic is disrupted by fog and poor visibility. Commuters face anxiety over new vehicle restrictions. While some relief is expected from wind, pollution levels are likely to stay high.

title: Nitish Kumar hijab video row: SP leader files police complaint against Bihar CM; seeks action
content: A complaint has been lodged against Bihar CM Nitish Kumar and UP minister Sanjay Nishad in Lucknow following a viral video. Nitish Kumar is accused of pulling a woman's hijab during an event, while Nishad allegedly made controversial remarks about the incident. Samajwadi Party leader Sumaiya Rana filed the complaint, citing hurt modesty and incitement of religious sentiments.

title: IPL Auction: From heartbreak to homecoming ‚Äî Prithvi Shaw, Sarfaraz Khan get late lifeline
content: The IPL 2026 auction saw dramatic comebacks for Prithvi Shaw and Sarfaraz Khan, both initially unsold but later picked up by Delhi Capitals and Chennai Super Kings respectively. Shaw's emotional social media post was followed by his return to his former franchise, while Sarfaraz gets a chance to shine under MS Dhoni.

title: Trump declares Venezuelan regime 'foreign terrorist organisation'; oil tankers blocked
content: President Trump has ordered a naval blockade of Venezuelan oil tankers, escalating pressure on Nicolas Maduro. Citing Venezuela's alleged use of oil revenues for illegal activities, Trump declared a massive naval buildup in South America. This military campaign, including strikes on vessels, aims to interdict drugs and potentially oust Maduro, according to administration officials.

title: Chip war fallout: Ukrainians sue Intel; allege reliance on ‚ÄòPutin checkbox‚Äô to bypass license rules
content: Ukrainian civilians are suing US chip giants Texas Instruments, AMD, and Intel in Texas, alleging their negligence allowed chips to arm Russian and Iranian weapons. Lawsuits claim companies ignored warnings and pressure to track chip destinations, leading to wrongful deaths. The complaint details negligence, negligence per se, gross negligence, wrongful death, and survival claims.

title: Communal clash in Ludhiana jail: Bricks fly, sirens wail as prisoners run amok
content: Violence erupted at Ludhiana Central Jail on Tuesday. Inmates attacked jail officials, including Superintendent Kulwant Singh Sidhu, who was injured. Other personnel also sustained injuries. The disturbance began with a fight between prisoners. Police were called to restore order. This incident follows a similar violent event in 2019.

title: Is the Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhishthan Bill dissolving federalism in education?
content: The Viksit Bharat Shiksha Adhishthan Bill, 2025, promises a sweeping overhaul of India‚Äôs higher education regulation by replacing legacy bodies with a centralised apex authority. While aligned with the NEP 2020‚Äôs reform agenda, critics warn that its concentration of power, appointment structure, and override clauses risk undermining institutional autonomy and the federal balance in education.

title: AI safety red line: Microsoft AI CEO sets a new stance; Will walk away from runaway AI systems
content: Microsoft's AI chief, Mustafa Suleyman, is setting a new course for artificial intelligence. He states Microsoft will stop developing any AI that could become uncontrollable. This new approach prioritizes human interests and safety above all else.  Suleyman envisions AI helping in medicine and potentially reshaping society.  He believes strong government oversight is crucial for AI's responsible growth.

title: Virat and Anushka leave fans disappointed after 'rude behaviour' with physically challenged boy
content: Cricketer Virat Kohli and actor Anushka Sharma faced backlash on social media after a video showed them seemingly ignoring a differently-abled fan requesting a photo at the Mumbai airport. The incident, occurring after their spiritual visit, led to accusations of hypocrisy and insensitivity from netizens, sparking disappointment among fans.

title: IPL auction: How all 10 teams stack up after bidding; full list of players
content: IPL auction saw record-breaking buys as Kolkata Knight Riders secured Cameron Green for Rs 25.20 crore and Matheesha Pathirana for Rs 18 crore. Uncapped Indian talents Prashant Veer and Kartik Sharma fetched Rs 14.20 crore each for Chennai Super Kings, becoming the highest-paid uncapped players. Several other big names found new homes.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‚Äòbanned‚Äô chips behind January market rout
content: Nvidia has refuted claims that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is secretly using its restricted Blackwell AI chips. The Information reported DeepSeek acquired smuggled GPUs for its upcoming AI model, a move Nvidia's spokesperson called "far-fetched." The US has banned these advanced chips' export to China to maintain its AI lead.

title: Top stocks to buy today: Stock recommendations for Dec 17 - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Anand Rathi's Mehul Kothari recommends CG Power, Marico, and Britannia for investment. CG Power shows a trend reversal from support, Marico breaks out of consolidation, and Britannia resumes its trend after forming a strong base.

title: IPL auction 2026: KKR break bank for Green; CSK bet big on uncapped Indians
content: Uncapped Indian talent drew massive attention, with Uttar Pradesh‚Äôs 20-year-old left-arm spinner Prashant Veer and Rajasthan‚Äôs 19-year-old wicketkeeper-batter Kartik Sharma both landing lucrative Rs 14.20 crore deals with Chennai Super Kings. Having entered the auction at a base price of Rs 30 lakh each, the pair went on to become the highest-paid uncapped players in IPL auction history.

title: Nightclub fire: Luthra brothers taken to Goa by police; to be produced at Mapusa court today
content: Goa Police have brought nightclub owners Gaurav and Saurabh Luthra back to India after their deportation from Thailand. The brothers are in custody in connection with a deadly fire at their Arpora nightclub that claimed 25 lives. They fled the country hours after the incident and were apprehended following an international manhunt.

title: Ayesha Curry admits she never expected to fall for NBA legend Stephen Curry
content: Stephen and Ayesha Curry's love story began in childhood at church, though they didn't start dating until their teenage years. Ayesha's unwavering support, even encouraging Stephen to finish his degree before the NBA draft, solidified his decision to marry her. Their enduring marriage has weathered public scrutiny, with Stephen consistently crediting his wife.

title: Sherrone Moore‚Äôs wife Kelli decides future amid alleged Paige Shiver affair
content: Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver's alleged affair drama sparked chaos among fans but it seems now his wife, Kelli Moore, has stepped into the drama, days after he was released from police custody. While Sherrone Moore faces serious accusations, Kelli Moore might have made a decision about her marriage and future.

title: NBA injury update: Wembanyama to play as Spurs face Knicks in NBA Cup final
content: The NBA Cup final features the Spurs against the Knicks in Las Vegas. Victor Wembanyama is back for the Spurs after an injury, ready to play any role needed.  Despite his eagerness to start, the team is carefully managing his minutes.  The Knicks will have their full starting lineup for this high-stakes championship game.

title: Megan Thee Stallion steps in as Klay Thompson‚Äôs fashion guide in romantic moment
content: Klay Thompson and Megan Thee Stallion eased breakup rumors with a playful closet video that highlighted their chemistry and comfort. The clip, featuring Megan styling Klay to Michael Jackson music, drew widespread praise from fans and celebrities alike. Without addressing speculation directly, the couple let their natural connection and shared joy speak louder than any rumor.

title: Vikram Bhatt, wife Shwetambari sent to judicial custody
content: Filmmaker Vikram Bhatt and his wife, Shwetambari, have been sent to judicial custody by a court in Udaipur in connection with an alleged Rs 30 crore fraud case. The court order came on Tuesday after their lawyer sought interim bail on medical grounds.

title: IPL auction 2026: Most expensive player for each team across all 10 franchises - find out
content: The IPL Auction 2026 saw record-breaking buys, with Cameron Green becoming the most expensive overseas player at Rs 25.20 crore. Chennai Super Kings dominated the uncapped market, securing Prashant Veer and Kartik Sharma for Rs 14.20 crore each. Several franchises made significant investments in key players, setting the stage for an exciting season.

title: Oscars: 'Homebound' gets shortlisted for the 'Best International Feature Film' category
content: India's 'Homebound' has advanced to the Academy Awards' Best International Feature Film shortlist, joining 14 other films from around the globe. Directed by Neeraj Ghaywan, the film explores friendship and the existential reasons behind migration from rural India, inspired by a true story during the pandemic.

title: Dense fog: IndiGo issues travel advisory; warns of potential flight delays
content: Dense fog is set to cause flight delays and disruptions across North and East India on Wednesday morning. IndiGo has issued a travel advisory, urging passengers to allow extra travel time and monitor flight status. The airline assures its teams are prepared to manage operations smoothly, prioritizing passenger safety amidst reduced visibility and potential road traffic impacts.

title: Vehicle ban chaos: Delhi restricts non-BS VI entry; commuters, residents slam abrupt move
content: Starting Thursday, a new Delhi government regulation prohibits non-BS VI vehicles from entering the capital. This sweeping ban threatens to throw daily commutes into chaos for countless commuters from regions like Gurgaon, Noida, and Ghaziabad. With over 200,000 vehicles impacted in Gurgaon alone, tensions are rising as many express discontent regarding the swift implementation and absent alternatives.

title: 'Dhurandhar': Ranveer‚ÄìAkshaye starrer crosses Rs 400 cr India net
content: Aditya Dhar's 'Dhurandhar', starring Ranveer Singh and Akshaye Khanna, has shattered box office records, achieving the biggest second week ever for a Hindi film. Surpassing Rs 200 crore net in its second week within just five days, the spy actioner is on track to exceed its opening week's earnings. The film's impressive performance, with an estimated Rs 411.

title: Yamuna Expressway crash: Mother throws her 2 kids out of burning bus, now missing
content: A mother's heroic act on the Yamuna Expressway saw her push her two children to safety from a burning bus, but she was trapped and is now feared dead. The multi-vehicle collision, caused by dense fog, resulted in at least 13 fatalities and over 90 injuries, with authorities struggling to identify victims.

title: Goa: Police stop IAS officer‚Äôs car for checking, forced to do squats; DG calls action unwarranted
content: North Goa SP Harischandra Madkaikar reportedly made police personnel perform squats after they stopped an IAS official during a traffic check. The official, allegedly angered by the stop, later returned, emptied his car boot onto the road, and challenged the officers to search it again before complaining to a senior. This incident has reportedly demoralized the police force.

title: Matthew Perry death case: Doctor who sold ketamine avoids jail, expresses regret
content: Dr. Mark Chavez, who played a role in supplying ketamine to the beloved actor Matthew Perry, has been given an 8-month sentence of home confinement. The doctor confessed to facilitating the drug's acquisition for another medical professional who dispensed it to Perry.

title: Moral policing: Woman police inspector questions brother, sister; suspended after viral video
content: A woman police inspector in Mau was removed after a video surfaced showing her questioning a young man and his sisters in a park, demanding proof of their sibling relationship as part of Mission Shakti. Officials deemed her questioning style inappropriate, emphasizing citizen dignity. A departmental probe is underway.

title: Victoria Beckham Net Worth 2025: Fashion icon‚Äôs business success and wealth
content: Victoria Beckham's net worth is estimated at $450 million in 2025, a testament to her successful transition from "Posh Spice" to a respected fashion and beauty mogul. Her brands, Victoria Beckham Fashion and Victoria Beckham Beauty, have shown significant growth, overcoming past challenges. The Netflix documentary "Beckham" further boosted her profile, solidifying her status as a formidable businesswoman.

title: Cardi B‚Äôs romance with Stefon Diggs gets approval from his mom in new post
content: Stefon Diggs' mother shared a heartwarming holiday Instagram carousel featuring a joyful moment with Grammy-winning rapper Cardi B. The post celebrated their blended families and offered a glimpse into their lives beyond the spotlight. This sweet snapshot follows their recent appearance at a community wellness event and the arrival of their first child together.

title: ‚ÄòThe Great Honour Nishan of Ethiopia‚Äô: PM Modi conferred highest civilian award in Addis Ababa
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received Ethiopia's highest civilian honour, The Great Honour Nishan of Ethiopia, during his first bilateral visit. The two nations agreed to elevate their relationship to a strategic partnership, focusing on cooperation in economy, innovation, technology, defence, and health.

title: Garrett Wilson injury update: Jets share cryptic message on WR‚Äôs return
content: Garrett Wilson sustained a few brutal knee injuries in this season which has kept him away from the field for the last few weeks. As the New York Jets‚Äô disastrous season comes to an end, all eyes are on the star wide receiver‚Äôs return to the field as the team opened up about his recovery. With the team gearing up for Sunday‚Äôs match, all eyes are on his return.

title: Bondi beach shooting: Slain suspect was from Hyderabad, moved to Australia 27 years ago
content: An Indian passport holder, Sajid Akram, identified as a suspect in the Sydney beach attack, had been living in Australia since 1998.  Authorities are investigating his alleged radicalization, which appears to have no connection to India.  He and his son, Naveed, are suspected of receiving military-style training in the Philippines.

title: 'Alcoholic's personality': Top aide makes explosive claims about Trump; calls Vance 'opportunist'
content: Chief of Staff Susie Wiles offered candid insights into President Trump's "alcoholic's personality" and Vice-President JD Vance's opportunism in a Vanity Fair article. Wiles also detailed Trump's belief in his own omnipotence and his drive for retribution, while criticizing others' handling of the Epstein files.

title: Popular weight-loss drugs may lower cancer risk, finds large study
content: Exciting new findings indicate that GLP-1 weight-loss medications might dramatically reduce the likelihood of 10 types of cancer linked to obesity for patients with type 2 diabetes, outperforming insulin. However, there's no observed benefit for postmenopausal breast or thyroid cancers.

title: Controversies and eventful episodes after the death of the greatest modern Tamil poet
content: Bharati‚Äôs body of work covered every genre in prose and verse, mostly in Tamil. In the field of prose poetry, he drew inspiration from Rabindranath Tagore (1861-1941)

title: Kumar Sanu moves Bombay HC against ex-wife over defamatory interviews, seeks ‚Çπ30 lakh damages
content: Playback singer Kumar Sanu alleges breach of 2001 consent terms and reputational harm from viral social media posts; demands removal of content and public apology

title: The future of governance in post-Maoist India
content: India‚Äôs Fifth Schedule areas became the hotbed of Maoist insurgencies due to administrative neglect, exacerbating discontent and a lack of representation of tribal groups in local bodies. Effective governance is crucial to address these issues and mitigate the ongoing challenges in these regions

title: Bangladesh‚Äôs threats to cut NE off cannot be tolerated: Assam CM

content: In the notification issued by the Union Home Ministry, the commission will now submit its report to the Central government "as soon as possible but not later than the 20th May, 2026"

content: Mahadevapura, home to some of the city‚Äôs largest IT hubs and fastest-expanding residential clusters, is choking under traffic bottlenecks that were flagged¬†nearly a¬†decade ago but remain unresolved

title: The two faces of Chennai‚Äôs Moore Market
content: Years of maladministration of Moore Market had brought it to a point where only a catastrophe could bring about change. And that is how it came to be.

content: Criminals are becoming fearless while government‚Äôs incompetence in preventing crime is instilling fear in the general public, said former CM Naveen Patnaik

content: ECI says anomalies¬†emerged¬†during progeny mapping; claims and objections window now open till January 15

title: Kashmir parties slam Bihar CM Nitish Kumar over removing veil of a female doctor
content: Ruling National Conference (NC) leader and Minister Sakina Ittoo termed Mr. Kumar‚Äôs act of publicly pulling at a Muslim woman‚Äôs naqab (face veil) as ‚Äúdeeply disturbing and indefensible‚Äù

title: Rajya Sabha clears additional allocation for fertilizer subsidy
content: Replying to a brief debate on the matter, Minister of State for Finance Pankaj Chaudhary said the expenses for fertilizers, and the use of fertilizers, particularly of urea, has increased.

title: Congress issues whip in Lok Sabha, asks MPs to be present in House for next three days
content: Key legislation such as the VB-G RAM G and a new Bill to overhaul laws governing India's civil nuclear sector are likely to come up for consideration and passage

title: India and the U.S.: 2005 versus 2025
content: The 2025 U.S. National Security Strategy document marks a profound departure from the logic articulated in 2005. For India, the implications are clear.

title: Number of fuel retail outlets in T.N. on the rise, even as existing ones in urban and peri-urban areas close¬†down
content: During the period April 2024-October 2025 alone, 611 new outlets have been commissioned by both PSUs and the private sector, with many coming up¬†along these roads that connect to growing towns and new industrial areas

title: Gunfire triggers fresh tension in Manipur
content: The incident occurred a day after 389 internally displaced persons returned to their homes in an area bordering Bishnupur and Churachandpur districts

title: PIL in Delhi HC seeks to increase payout to Indigo passengers
content: Indigo operates around 410 aircraft with 5,700 pilots, translating to roughly 14 pilots per aircraft. This skeletal staffing model is insufficient, the plea said

title: Area where deepathoon is located belongs to dargah: T.N. Waqf Board
content: It cites the judgment in the 1920 Original Suit on demarcating the portions belonging to the temple and the Sikandar Badusha Dargah; says issue can be resolved through ‚Äòcourt-monitored mediation‚Äô

title: Congress likely to prefer single mayoral term for Kochi
content: The split-term arrangement has not worked well and has often led to conflicts within the UDF, especially affecting the Congress, whether in mayoral posts, municipal and grama panchayat chairpersonships, or even standing committee leadership

title: PM Modi conferred with Ethiopia‚Äôs highest honour by PM Abiy Ahmed of Ethiopia
content: Prime Minister Modi was conferred with the award for his contribution towards strengthening India-Ethiopia partnership and for his visionary leadership as a global statesman, the Ministry of External Affairs said in a statement in New Delhi.

title: Farm sector‚Äôs continued poor performance, an area of concern for Tamil Nadu
content: However, thanks to the far better performance of the secondary and tertiary sectors, the State has been able to grow in an impressive manner

title: Watch: Government introduces bill in Lok Sabha to hike FDI in insurance sector to 100 per cent
content: The government has introduced a bill in the Lok Sabha to raise Foreign Direct Investment in the insurance sector from 74 per cent to 100 per cent, triggering strong protests from Opposition parties

title: Karnataka to regulate pigeon feeding, citing respiratory health concerns
content: The Deputy Secretary of the Health and Family Welfare Department, V. Lakshminath, has written to the Urban Development Department to initiate steps to regulate and prohibit the feeding of pigeons in public places¬†

title: Gabrielle Union urged Ayesha Curry to dump Steph for a hilarious reason
content: Gabrielle Union once advised a young Stephen and Ayesha Curry to break up, believing their relationship wouldn't last. During a COVID-era Instagram Live, she humorously recalled telling them to "enjoy life" and "have s*x with other people."  However, Union now praises their enduring and consistent bond, calling them "unicorns" in relationships.

title: India, Ethiopia elevate ties to strategic partnership as PM Modi holds talks with his counterpart
content: ‚ÄúWe are elevating India and Ethiopia relations to a strategic partnership. This step will provide new energy, new momentum and new depth to our ties,‚Äù PM Modi said during the delegation-level talks

content: Issuing a slew of guidelines, the High Court had said each clinical establishment shall prominently display a list of the services offered and the baseline and package rates for commonly performed procedures

content: Officials say that it was done in keeping with NEP 2020 suggestion to minimise conflict of interest, but maintain that grant-giving power will be with Ministry, and regulatory reports will be a ‚Äòmajor factor‚Äô in deciding amount of funding

title: IFFK 2025: DJ Ahmet ‚Äî a crowd-pleasing feature on teenage camaraderie
content: In the film being screened in the World Cinema category at the 30th International Film Festival of Kerala, the 15-something Ahmet sets the tone for an infectiously joyous feature set on the Balkan grasslands of rural North Macedonia

title: Ciza Thomas, Saji Gopinath V-Cs as  government, Governor reach truce
content: The appointments come after Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan drops his long-held objection to CIza Thomas‚Äô elevation and Governor follows suit in the case of Saji Gopinath following a conciliatory meeting held two days ago

title: Government tables Bill to replace MGNREGA amid protests
content: Centre says Bill is ‚Äòin line with Gandhiji‚Äôs sentiments‚Äô and will bring ‚ÄòRam Rajya‚Äô to villages; Opposition says the new legislation will weaken employment rights of the poor and demands that the Bill be sent for Parliamentary scrutiny

title: Watch: Opposition protests as VB‚ÄëG RAM G Bill introduced to replace MGNREGA
content: Following protests inside the Parliament complex, the Congress announced a nationwide agitation on Wednesday

title: Supreme Court shocked at ‚Äòstaggering‚Äô sums siphoned off from India by digital arrest fraudsters
content: The Chief Justice tells RBI that lapses by bankers to allow such a large-scale scam to happen and even thrive may amount to ‚Äòdeficiency in service‚Äô

title: TNCC, VCK oppose Bill replacing MNREGA
content: TNCC president K. Selvaperunthagai says the party would organise a protest; VCK chief Thol. Thirumavalavan says the new Bill has been introduced with the intention of dismantling the employment scheme

title: Govt. to consider bringing aided school teachers under ‚ÄòArogya Sanjivini
content: Minister for School Education and Literacy Madhu Bangarappa has said that the government is positive towards bringing the teachers of aided schools under ‚ÄòArogya Sanjivini‚Äô schemes which enables the teachers to get cashless treatment in empanelled hospitals.

title: Make introspection to check if minority votes drifted away from LDF: CPI
content: CPI feels the LDF‚Äôs undiluted stance on Palestine, CAA, NEP, hijab, minority persecution in BJP-ruled States and related issues did not translate into votes

title: Election Commission publishes draft electoral rolls for three States and two UTs
content: Over 58 lakh names have been removed from the existing voter lists in West Bengal,¬†nearly 42¬†lakh¬†in Rajasthan, 10¬†lakh¬†in Goa, a little more than a lakh in Puducherry and¬†nearly 1,500¬†in¬†Lakshwadweep.¬†¬†

title: SIR form submission: deadline ends on December 18
content: Kozhikode District Collector Snehil Kumar Singh has urged eligible voters to ensure that their details are included in the draft list by submitting the forms without fail

title: With a comfortable win, UDF has  a smooth road ahead in  Kalamassery
content: Congress parliamentary party has almost confirmed Jamal Manakkadan‚Äôs candidature for the post of chairperson after the UDF secured victory in 30 of the total 46 wards in the municipality

title: DGCA assures HC that IndiGo will implement new pilot duty norms before February 10
content: Regulator says exemptions were ‚Äúnot granted happily‚Äù amid operational disruptions that have witnessed over 5,000 flight cancellations

title: Supreme Court refers to three-judge Bench a plea to protect the rights of intersex children
content: The case underscored the vital need for the judiciary and government to distinguish between sex identity and gender identity, and to clarify that intersex persons were not transgender

title: Udhayanidhi Stalin launches Athlete Management System
content: He says the State government is bringing together training, wellness, performance, and medical insights into a single, intelligent digital platform for the first time

title: Lok Sabha passes Bill for repealing or amending obsolete laws
content: The proposed legislation was aimed at removing outdated laws, correcting errors that had crept in during the law-making process and removing discriminatory aspects of certain laws

title: 5,757 constables inducted into A.P. Police; monthly stipend hiked to ‚Çπ12,500
content: 23,676 police jobs have been provided during NDA‚Äôs tenure, says the Chief Minister, adding that the government is committed to its promise of creating 20 lakh jobs

title: Rashtrapati Bhavan displays portraits of all 21 Param Vir Chakra awardees
content: ‚ÄòThe initiative...marks a step toward shedding the colonial mindset and embracing, with pride, the richness of India‚Äôs culture, heritage, and timeless traditions,‚Äô a Rashtrapati Bhavan release said

title: Karnataka Assembly adopts GBA amendment Bill to add members
content: The Deputy Chief Minister agreed to the suggestion by the Opposition members to drop the provision for appointing nominated members to the GBA

title: India‚ÄìMaldives military exercise concludes in Thiruvananthapuram
content: The exercise focused on counter-insurgency and counter-terrorist operations in contemporary operational environments

title: Govt. considering multiple options to put Rushikonda buildings to use
content: The structures will be used in a manner that benefits the public, while also generating sustainable revenue for the Tourism Department, say Ministers

title: Second phase of Vizhinjam port development to begin in January
content: Next phases of construction will see an investment of ‚Çπ9,700 crore by the concessionaire. Approach road to port from National Highway-66 will also be inaugurated

title: ‚ÄòSafe Road Happy Road' project flags alarming gaps in pedestrian safety in Thrissur
content: Study by St. Thomas College, in collaboration with the MVD, finds only 20% of motorists stop at zebra crossings

title: Teetotaler Trump Has "Alcoholic's Personality": Chief Of Staff Susie Wiles
content: Donald Trump said Tuesday he stood by his chief of staff Susie Wiles after she said the US president had an "alcoholic's personality" in an astonishing interview with Vanity Fair.

title: AI Romance Blooms As Japan Woman Weds Virtual Partner Of Her Dreams
content: Hoon and Satoshi Sugiyama OKAYAMA, Japan, Dec 17 (Reuters)  Music played in a wedding hall in western Japan as Yurina Noguchi, wearing a white gown and tiara, dabbed away her tears,

title: Suspected Shooter Seen Recceing Brown University In New FBI Video
content: Authorities in the United States have released a new video timeline and a slightly clearer image of a man suspected to be the Brown University shooter.

title: Trump Slams Radical Islamic Terrorism At Hanukkah Event After Sydney Shooting
content: US President Donald Trump has urged nations to have a united front against radical Islam after an Islamic State-inspired terror attack on a Jewish Hanukkah celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach claimed 15 lives.

title: Sydney Shooters' 28-Day Trip: A Look Inside Extremism In Philippines
content: On Tuesday, that lingering threat came under renewed scrutiny after Australian authorities disclosed that the suspects in the Bondi Beach massacre in Sydney were motivated by ISIS ideology, had travelled to the Philippines shortly before the attack.

title: Exclusive Pic Of Luthras At Delhi Airport, Being Taken To Goa To Face Charges
content: The Luthra brothers, against whom a case of culpable homicide and negligence is registered, were brought back to India on an IndiGo flight last afternoon.

title: Trump Expands Travel Ban, Curbs To 20 More Countries. Check Full List
content: The Trump administration announced it was expanding travel restrictions to an additional 20 countries and the Palestinian Authority, doubling the number of nations affected by sweeping limits announced on who can travel and emigrate to the US.

title: Trump's Approval Rating Drops To 39%, Economy Weighs: Survey
content: President Donald Trump's approval rating slipped in recent days to nearly its lowest level of his current term as voters from his Republican Party soured on his handling of the economy, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.

title: Trump Declares Venezuela Regime 'Foreign Terrorist Organisation', Blocks Oil Tankers
content: Trump said he is ordering a blockade of all "sanctioned oil tankers" into Venezuela, ramping up pressure on the country's authoritarian leader Maduro in a move that seemed designed to put a tighter chokehold on the South American country's economy.

title: India, Israel Share "Zero Tolerance" Policy Against Terrorism: S Jaishankar
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Tuesday condemned the terror attack during a Hanukkah celebration at Sydney's Bondi Beach, saying that India and Israel both have a policy of "zero tolerance" against terrorism.

title: 4 Arrested For Blocking School Van, Pointing Toy Gun At Student In Gurugram
content: Gurugram police have arrested four college students for allegedly blocking a school van with two vehicles and threatening a Class 12 student by brandishing a toy gun, police said on Tuesday.

title: IndiGo Issues Advisory Amid Dense Fog In North, East India
content: IndiGo on Tuesday night issued a travel advisory for a foggy Wednesday morning, with reduced visibility and slower flight movements expected as misty winter skies blanket North and East India.

title: Bengal Government Took Action After Messi Incident: Abhishek Banerjee
content: Trinamool Congress national general secretary Abhishek Banerjee on Tuesday said the West Bengal government has taken action following the chaos during an event involving Argentine soccer star Lionel Messi.

title: Australia Holds First Funeral For Bondi Beach Attack Victims
content: Australia will hold the first funeral Wednesday for victims of the Bondi Beach mass shooting, with mourners gathering to grieve slain rabbi Eli Schlanger.

title: 2nd Doctor In Matthew Perry Overdose Case Sentenced To Home Confinement
content: A second California doctor was sentenced on Tuesday to eight months of home confinement for illegally supplying "Friends" star Matthew Perry with ketamine, the powerful sedative that caused the actor's fatal drug overdose in a hot tub in 2023.

title: Rob Reiner's Son To Face Murder Charges In Parents' Killing
content: Rob Reiner's son Nick Reiner will be charged with two counts of first-degree murder in the killing of his parents, Los Angeles County prosecutors said Tuesday.

title: Trump Imposes Full Travel Bans On 7 More Countries, Palestinians
content: The Trump administration is expanding its travel ban to include five more countries and impose new limits on others.

title: Chile President-Elect Calls For End To Venezuela's "Dictatorship"
content: Chile's hard-right president-elect Jose Antonio Kast said Tuesday he would "support any situation that ends the dictatorship" of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro.

title: Gurugram Police Arrests Two For Kidnapping, Robbing Youth
content: Gurugram police has arrested two accused for allegedly kidnapping a youth in a car and robbing him, officials said.

title: "The Best Is Yet To Come": Trump Says He Will Address Nation Today
content: President Donald Trump said he would give a televised address to the nation on Wednesday, adding that it had been a "great year" for the United States since his return to power in January.

title: Free agent pickups: What can you do to replace Patrick Mahomes?
content: the 15th Sunday of the season featured several notable comebacks . a pair of season-ending knee injuries might be what defines this week for both the short and long term . the quarterbacks lost to the los Angeles Chargers, eliminating them from postseason contention .

title: Sean McVay, Rams announce birth of son, Christian Alexander McVay
content: new: "what a crazy week to be playing on a Thursday," coach says . new: he says he's "a blessing to be able to play in meaningful games" new: his wife, veronika, welcomed a baby boy named Christian Alexander McVay . the baby boy was born the day after the Rams clinched a playoff berth .

title: Latest AP poll: What's next for every Top 25 team?
content: the sixth in-season edition of the men's AP Top 25 poll features little movement . Arizona retains its No. 1 position, with no changes in the top 10 other than Gonzaga and Houston swapping the no. 7 and 8 spots . only one new team cracks this week's top 25 .

title: Best fits for transfer quarterback DJ Lagway: Five schools that make the most sense
content: DJ Lagway is the top-rated quarterback in the 2024 ESPN 300 . he's coming off a 4-8 season in which he threw 14 interceptions and ranked 14th in the conference in QBR (59.5) but there's still a market for his talents if the 19-game starter can find the right situation and stay healthy .

title: MMA divisional rankings: Manel Kape makes a big move to close 2025
content: manel Kape defeats former title challenger Brandon Royval in the first round . the win shot Kape up the flyweight rankings and squarely into the championship picture . a fighter must have competed over the past 12 months or have a fight booked .

title: Ranking all 64 teams in College Football Playoff history
content: the new era of college football features a larger College Football Playoff and a lower bar for inclusion . the transfer portal and increased freedom of movement for players have meant that today's best teams can't stockpile awesome backups as easily as they could in the past .

title: College football bowl season: MVPs for the first two bowl games of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40‚Äì38 with a two-point conversion . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway . college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: Delhi pollution: Non-Delhi private vehicles below BS-VI barred while GRAP 3 remains in force
content: . Priyangi Agarwal writes on environmental and climate change issues, connecting these topics to the everyday lives of people. She tracks developments across the capital‚Äôs transport hubs‚ÄîDelhi Metro, Namo Bharat Trains, and Delhi Airport‚Äîwhile also reporting on pressing social issues. Her stories blend data analysis with voices from the ground to tell human-centred narratives. Previously stationed in western Uttar Pradesh, she focused her coverage on minority issues, health, and human rights. Read More

title: Congress claims Herald case proved baseless; not over yet, says BJP
content: BJP says court's refusal to take cognisance of ED chargesheet is no exoneration of sonia Gandhi . a bail should not be seen as acquittal, senior lawyer and Congress MP says . the govt used the media to exaggerate groundless claims .

title: SIR: 1.9cr in Bengal face notice over mapping, discrepancies
content: . Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‚Äòprime‚Äô political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India‚Äôs neighbourhood. Read More

title: Search continues for 3 Pakistani terrorists in Udhampur forest; police say escape routes sealed
content: three terrorists holed up in a dense forest near a village in udhampur . security forces on Tuesday intensified their operation to trace them . one terrorist is believed to have been injured, but there was no official confirmation .

title: 'Ram ka naam badnaam na karo', Tharoor tells government-watch
